trans-unit.source:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"
Scathe Zombies
trans-unit.target: 枯萎灵俑

trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay o1. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何生物由场上置入坟墓场时，你可以支付1。若你如此做，则你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.

trans-unit.target: 知识无所不知。

trans-unit.source: Static Orb
trans-unit.target: 静态球

trans-unit.source: If Static Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 若静态球并未横置，则牌手于其重置步骤中不能重置多于两个永久物。

trans-unit.source: The warriors fought against the paralyzing waves until even their thoughts froze in place.
trans-unit.target: 战士们尽力抗拒那股使人麻痹的浪潮，直到连他们的思想都冻结住了。

trans-unit.source: Storm Cauldron
trans-unit.target: 风暴鼎镬

trans-unit.source: Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手在他的回合中可以额外多使用一张地。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何地横置以产生法术力时，将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Storm Cauldron
trans-unit.target: 风暴鼎镬

trans-unit.source: Teferi's Puzzle Box
trans-unit.target: 泰菲力的魔术方块

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手将他的手牌以任意次序置于他的牌库底，然后抓等量的牌。
